__e: Took an arm from a Navy Admiral?
Man, they'll make anyone an admiral these days!
And maybe I want you to see that you are still needed here... no matter what some idiot Starfleet admiral might think.
Admiral, I doubt you brought us all this way just for a debriefing.
Admiral, I can't squeeze it out of him.
Admiral, the prosecuting attorney agreed to our demands.
Yet he was passed over for admiral last month.

Only eight more minutes, Admiral and it will be too late for you to do anything.
Admiral, we got to get you inside right now.
